metadata.name: Content Creation & Distribution Pipeline
metadata.description: Multi-channel content workflow for creating, optimizing, and distributing marketing content across platforms with brand consistency.

workflow.description: Automated content creation & distribution pipeline workflow

steps.action: Research trending topics and competitor content for target audience
Ensure brand voice, tone, and visual guidelines are applied
Create engaging video scripts with hooks, storytelling, and CTAs
Generate social media posts optimized for each platform (Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram)
Write SEO-optimized blog posts and how-to guides
Optimize content for conversions with A/B testing recommendations
Schedule content distribution across channels with analytics tracking

benefits: Consistent brand voice across all content channels
SEO-optimized content for better search rankings
Data-driven content strategy with analytics integration
